heroDescription2: When I’m not coding or working on projects, I enjoy
heroDescription5: to stay active and balanced in life.
jobDescription1: I joined as a student in the academy, where I was guided through a growth-oriented path aimed at preparing me for my first work experience, described in the next card. The course covered topics such as frontend development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, as well as backend technologies including Java Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Spring Data, Validation, Hibernate, JPA, MySQL, J2EE with JSP.
jobDescription2: Frontend project related to the Banco BPM website, using Java as the programming language and managing the frontend with Struts and JSP using the JSTL library, while integrating some logic with jQuery.
jobDescription3: Backend REST service management involving communication and data exchange between the client and an external provider. The REST service was developed in Java using Spring Boot, connected to an Oracle database, and integrated with Hibernate. YAML files were used as call templates to ensure correct data reception from external sources. I used IntelliJ as the IDE and Postman for various testing activities.
jobDescription4: Management, maintenance, and development of an entire application, starting from the frontend built entirely in Java using an internal framework based on JSP with JavaScript and CSS. The backend, developed in Java, communicates with external services following a SOAP structure. The database used is DB2. Testing is performed using SoapUI. I use Eclipse as the IDE, Bitbucket for version control, Jira for release management, and Confluence for documentation.
jobDescription5: Created, developed, released, and currently maintained: a fully React-based frontend that leverages libraries such as React Query (for backend service calls), React Hook Form, Redux, and Cookies for session and user management, along with Tailwind CSS and Material UI for styling.
studyGrade3: High School Diploma in Computer Science
footerTitle: Thank you for visiting my portfolio!

thisSiteDescription: A personal website built with React, Tailwind CSS, and other modern technologies.
